metadata.title: Open Claude Cowork - Desktop AI Assistant
metadata.description: Bring Claude Code from terminal to desktop with visual AI collaboration experience. No Claude Max subscription required, supports Chinese LLMs.

hero.title: Open Claude Cowork
hero.subtitle: Desktop AI Assistant
hero.description: Bring Claude Code from terminal to desktop with visual AI collaboration experience.
hero.description2: No Claude Max subscription required, supports Zhipu GLM, MiniMax, Kimi, DeepSeek and other Chinese LLMs.

features.title: Core Features
features.subtitle: Open Claude Cowork provides complete visual AI collaboration experience

aiPartner.title: AI Partner
aiPartner.description: Not just a GUI, but an AI assistant that can execute code, manage files, create PPTs, and analyze research. Supports any programming language with natural language task descriptions.

sessionManagement.title: Session Management
sessionManagement.description: Create sessions with custom working directories and restore any historical conversation. Complete local session history (SQLite storage), supports secure deletion and automatic persistence.

realtimeStreaming.title: Real-time Streaming
realtimeStreaming.description: Token-by-token streaming output to see Claude's reasoning process. Supports Markdown rendering and syntax highlighting, visual tool calls and status indicators.

permissionControl.title: Tool Permission Control
permissionControl.description: Sensitive operations require explicit approval, allow or deny by tool. Interactive decision panel gives you full control over Claude's behavior, ensuring safe and controllable AI operations.

configReuse.title: Configuration Reuse
configReuse.description: Directly reuse ~/.claude/settings.json configuration, same API keys, base URL, models. Configure once, use everywhere, zero learning cost.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Download Open Claude Cowork now and experience visual AI collaboration

footer.description: Bring Claude Code from terminal to desktop with visual AI collaboration experience.
footer.copyright: ¬© 2025 Open Claude Cowork. Open Source Project

advantages.title: Why Choose Open Claude Cowork?
advantages.subtitle: Improvements and advantages over Claude Code

quickStart.title: Quick Start
quickStart.subtitle: 4 steps to complete installation and configuration
quickStart.tipDescription: Make sure Node.js 18+ and npm are installed. To use Chinese LLMs, modify the base_url and api_key in settings.json.
